message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to your business. I understand it's worth $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,150,000. This is a significant discount considering the value it holds for you. Please consider this offer carefully, as I have another interested buyer who is willing to purchase it for $1,000,000.
